meanings.sent1: The unfathered puppy was adopted by a kind family.
meanings.sent2: The unfathered child grew up with his grandparents.
meanings.sent3: The unfathered kitten found a new home with a loving owner.
meanings.sent4: The unfathered tree stood alone in the middle of the field.
meanings.sent5: The unfathered duckling followed the mother duck closely.

meanings.definition: Not acknowledged or recognized as a father.
meanings.sent1: The unfathered man struggled with his identity.
meanings.sent2: The unfathered individual faced societal challenges.
meanings.sent3: The unfathered hero saved the day without anyone knowing.
meanings.sent4: The unfathered leader guided his team silently from the shadows.
meanings.sent5: The unfathered king ruled in secret, unknown to his subjects.
